answers.answer: as long as his liver enzyme tests are normal i would not be concerned as a liver condition can cause the itching as can diabetes and kidney problems.  I wonder if the study medication could be playing a role.  Actigall is a commonly used medication post-transplant and can paradoxically cause itching.
Could the sulpha drug be the cause?
yes definitely but usually accompanied by a rash
Thanks again for your wise counsel. No rash yet - so we are leaning towards one of the drugs in the trial.
